pageContent: Backgrounds: To assess the prognostic value of new Gleason grade grouping system in high-risk prostate cancer patients, we compared oncological outcomes after radical prostatectomy for patients with Gleason score 8 versus 9-10.

metaData.source:
Should function and bother be measured and reported separately for prostate cancer quality-of-life domains?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16979720/
